section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2009 altercation ===

sentences: In February 2009, Knight was taken to Scottsdale Healthcare Osborn to be treated for facial injuries he received during an altercation at a private party in the W Scottsdale Hotel, where Knight was reportedly punched.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2009 altercation ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === 2012 arrest ===

sentences: On February 8, 2012, Knight was arrested in Las Vegas, after police found cannabis in his car and several warrants for prior traffic violations.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2012 arrest ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: 2014 shooting =
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: On August 24, 2014, Knight was shot at a pre-Video Music Awards party hosted by Chris Brown at a West Hollywood Sunset Strip nightclub ("1OAK").
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: Although shot six times, he was able to walk from the venue to an ambulance.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: His injuries required surgery.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: It is reported by investigators that evidence from closed circuit television (CCTV) footage showed that Knight was the intended target of the shooting.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: Knight was released from the hospital on August 27.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: Friend Keith Middlebrook told the New York Daily News that Knight returned home with the intentions to "heal up in a few days and be stronger than ever".
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: Knight refused to cooperate with law enforcement on the matter.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===

sentences: Party attendee Jeezy later claimed on The Breakfast Club that he would have been shot had he not been pushed out of the way just prior to the shooting.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === 2014 shooting ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of robbery (2014–present) ===

sentences: Prosecution on charges of robbery (2014–present)
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of robbery (2014–present) ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of robbery (2014–present) ===

sentences: On October 29, 2014, Knight and comedian Katt Williams were both arrested and charged with second-degree robbery in connection with an alleged theft of a camera from a paparazzi photographer the previous month in Beverly Hills, California.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of robbery (2014–present) ===

sentences: While in jail, doctors found a blood clot in Knight's lung.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of robbery (2014–present) ===

sentences: Both Knight and Williams pleaded not guilty to robbery.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of robbery (2014–present) ===

sentences: In 2016, the robbery trial was delayed until the resolution of the unrelated murder trial.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of robbery (2014–present) ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017)
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: On January 29, 2015, Knight crashed his car into two men, killing Terry Carter (his friend and co-founder of Heavyweight Records) and fled the scene in Compton, California.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: The second victim, filmmaker Cle Sloan, suffered a mangled foot and head injuries.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: Witnesses claimed Knight followed the men to a burger stand parking lot after an argument on the Straight Outta Compton film set, and that the collision looked intentional.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: Security footage video showed Knight running over both men.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: Knight claimed he acted in self-defense.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: In March 2015, Knight was hospitalized after he told a judge that he was suffering from blindness and other complications.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: Knight fired attorneys handling his murder case and said he was receiving inadequate medical treatment while in custody.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: The same month, a court set bail for his release for US$25 million.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: Knight collapsed in court shortly after the bail setting was announced.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: On April 16, 2015, Knight's bail was reduced to US$10 million.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: In July 2015, Knight's lawyer claimed that Knight might have a brain tumor on the same day that Knight's request for lower bail was refused.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: In January 2016, Knight changed counsel in his murder trial for a fourth time.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: In May 2016, three attorneys replaced the two hired earlier in the year.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: In July 2016, the judge denied Knight's motion to reveal the identities of several key prosecution witnesses, citing Knight's long history of violence.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: Knight became emotional after the ruling, stating that because of his health problems, he will die in jail.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: In March 2017, Knight was hospitalized after suffering from blood clots, a condition that had been affecting him for two years by that time.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: Knight's hospitalization delayed the trial to September 2018.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: When September arrived, Knight pleaded no contest to voluntary manslaughter.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: The judge sentenced Knight to 28 years in prison: 22 years for running over the victim and 6 years because it was Knight's third strike under California's Three-strikes law.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===

sentences: As of December 2018, Knight is incarcerated at RJ Donovan Correctional Facility in San Diego, and will not be eligible for parole until July 2037.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of voluntary manslaughter (2015–2017) ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of threatening death (2017) ===

sentences: Prosecution on charges of threatening death (2017)
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of threatening death (2017) ===
== Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of threatening death (2017) ===

sentences: In August 2017, a grand jury indicted Knight on charges of "threatening death or bodily injury" for sending threatening text messages to F. Gary Gray, the director of Straight Outta Compton, on August 8, 2017.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of threatening death (2017) ===

sentences: Knight pleaded not guilty to the charge, and the charge was dropped as part of Knight's plea agreement in the death of Terry Carter.
section: == Personal and legal troubles == | === Prosecution on charges of threatening death (2017) ===
